name: xtyped
description: Extended type schema library for javascript.
author: Panates Ltd.

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/ test/types
